name: Charon Leaped
description:
A 2D sci-fi horror puzzle game, made in 7 days for the Yogscast Game Jam 2021. The theme was "Opposites".

Controls

  • Walk - A and D or Left Thumbstick
  • Jump/Skip Text - Space or A Button
  • Interact - E or X Button
  • Warp - Q or B Button
  • Reset Room - R or Y Button
  • Quit - Escape or Start Button

Known issues

Large framerate drops may cause issues with the physics. A dedicated graphics card is recommended.
